modName: iLoveLydia - Athletic CBBE texture with some gloss
summary: Collection of maps & models I re-did for my favorite housecarl Lydia. It features a modified muscular / toned / athletic normap map, a slightly glossy specular map for both face and body.
descriptionHtml:
Collection of maps & models I re-did for my favorite housecarl Lydia. It features a modified muscular / toned / athletic normap map, a slightly glossy specular map for both face and body. 


Installation
=======================================
Install through NNM or unpack the contents to the \\Data\\ folder

Notes
=======================================
- Overwrites the female body, head and hand/feet textures + Lydia face tint
- Overwrites Lydias head mesh (Apachii hair used)
- Turns Lydia into marriage candidate, who sleeps naked and has wedding dress as basic outfit. Higher pitched voice

Also:
Edit the wedding dress by placing the mesh of choice in the location: \'meshes\\clothes\\weddingdress\\\'

hatf_0.nif / hatf_1.nif - Nice for a circlet
outfitf_0.nif / outfitf_1.nif - whatever dress you like
sandalsf_0.nif / sandalsf_1.nif - skyheels or a different boot/shoe etc


Conflicts
=======================================
This mod will conflict with every other mod that changes the female body, head, hand & feet textures. Also Lydia related mods will probably conflict (iLoveLydia.esp version only).



File contents / Uninstallation
=======================================
Full version (incl Lydia mod):
Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\female\\femalebody_1.dds
Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\female\\femalebody_1_msn.dds
